metadata.title: CVE-2022-22662 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A cookie management issue was addressed with improved state management.This issue is fixed in Security Update 2022-003 Catalina, macOS Big Sur11.6.5. Processing maliciously crafted web content may disclose sensitiveuser information.

criterions.comment: webkitgtk package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
webkit2gtk package in bionic is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it.
qtwebkit-source package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
